casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as Trustee Under Pooling and Servicing Agreement Dated as of March 1, 2006 Asset-backed Securities Corporation Home Equity Loan Trust, Series NC 2006-HE2 Asset-backed Pass-through Certificates, Series NC 2006-HE2, et al, Respondent
v.
James L. FORTUNATO, Sr., Petitioner No. 345 WAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. January 31, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 31st day of January, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
